DAMAGED ITEM.name: Damage Item With Return Request / Open Case
DAMAGED ITEM.content:
Hi,

We apologize for the inconvenience of receiving a damaged item. We’ve made an exception to our standard procedure: no need to return the part. We have initiated a full refund to your original payment method; it will reflect within 1–5 business days. You may keep or dispose of the item.

We’d appreciate the following additional images:

  1. Shipping label attached to the box
  2. Image of the box
  3. Image of the thumb-sized Part Number (SKU label) on the item
  4. Image(s) of the item

If you still need the part, feel free to place a new order. Thank you for your understanding.

Sincerely,
WooParts

DAMAGED ITEM.name: Damaged Return (No Tracking Number Yet)
DAMAGED ITEM.content:
Hi,

We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience of receiving a damaged item. No return is required; you may keep or dispose of it.

To proceed, let us know if you prefer a refund or replacement, and please cancel or close the return request so we can move forward.

Additional images needed:

  1. Shipping label attached to the box
  2. Image of the box
  3. Image of the thumb-sized Part Number (SKU label) on the item

Thank you for your cooperation.

Sincerely,
WooParts

DAMAGED ITEM.name: Defective Item
DAMAGED ITEM.content:
Hi,

Thank you for reaching out and we apologize you received a defective item. We’ve issued a full refund to your original payment method; it will reflect within 1–5 business days. No return is required—you may keep or dispose of the item.

We will investigate to prevent recurrence. Thank you for your understanding.

Sincerely,
WooParts

RETURNS.name: Return Request
RETURNS.content:
Hi,

Your return request has been approved. Our Returns Department may take up to 5 days after receipt to verify condition and process your refund.

Thank you for choosing us. We look forward to serving you again.

Regards,
WooParts

RETURNS.name: Returnless Refund
RETURNS.content:
Hi,

We received your return request and have made an exception—no need to return the part. A full refund has been issued to your original payment method; it will reflect within 1–5 business days.

If you’re satisfied with our service, we’d appreciate positive feedback.

Regards,
WooParts

RETURNS.name: Returnless (Doesn’t Fit)
RETURNS.content:
Hi,

We’re sorry the part didn’t fit. No return is necessary. A full refund has been processed; it will reflect within 1–5 business days.

To help improve listings, please provide your vehicle’s VIN or OEM number.

Sincerely,
WooParts

RETURNS.name: Close Return Request
RETURNS.content:
Hi,

Your return request has been received. No return is required; we will issue a full refund. Please close or cancel your return request at your convenience.

Best regards,
WooParts

RETURNS.name: Approved Return (Doesn’t Fit)
RETURNS.content:
Hi,

We’ve approved your return request. Our Returns Department may take up to 5 days after receipt to verify condition and process the refund.

Please provide your vehicle’s VIN or OEM number to help us improve compatibility checks.

Regards,
WooParts

RETURNS.name: Returned Items Received by Warehouse (Needs Refund)
RETURNS.content:
Hi,

We received and inspected your returned item. A full refund has been initiated; it will reflect within 1–5 business days.

Best regards,
WooParts

RETURNS.name: Returned Item Different From What Was Ordered (Safe-T Claims)
RETURNS.content:
Hi,

Our warehouse found that the item you returned differs from what was sold. Please send the correct part(s) with tracking so we can process your refund upon receipt.

Regards,
WooParts

SHIPMENT CONCERNS.name: Shipping Update (Awaiting Shipment)
SHIPMENT CONCERNS.content:
Hi,

We have a 2-business-day handling time. Estimated delivery is 3–5 business days. You’ll receive a tracking number once shipped.

Thank you for your patience.

Sincerely,
WooParts

SHIPMENT CONCERNS.name: Lost in Transit
SHIPMENT CONCERNS.content:
Hi,

We’re sorry—your package appears lost in transit. We’ve issued a full refund; it will reflect within 1–5 business days.

We’re working with the carrier to investigate and prevent future incidents.

Sincerely,
WooParts

SHIPMENT CONCERNS.name: Item Not Received
SHIPMENT CONCERNS.content:
Hi,

Tracking shows delivery on [DELIVERY DATE] via [CARRIER]. Please check less visible spots and with neighbors. If still missing after checking, let us know so we can assist.

Best regards,
WooParts

SHIPMENT CONCERNS.name: No Movement (USPS)
SHIPMENT CONCERNS.content:
Hi,

We apologize—USPS sometimes delays tracking updates. Please allow 3–5 business days for movement. If still no updates then, we’ll issue a refund.

Thank you for your patience.

Sincerely,
WooParts

CANCELLATION.name: For Shipped Items
CANCELLATION.content:
Hi,

Your cancellation request was rejected because the item shipped on [DATE] via [CARRIER]. Once you receive it, contact us to explore resolution options. Thank you for your understanding.

Sincerely,
WooParts

CANCELLATION.name: For Awaiting Shipment Items
CANCELLATION.content:
Hi,

Your order has been canceled and a full refund initiated; it will reflect within 1–5 business days.

Best regards,
WooParts

CANCELLATION.name: For Dropship Items
CANCELLATION.content:
Hi,

Your order entered the shipping queue. We’ll try to intercept it but cannot guarantee. We’ll keep you updated.

Best regards,
WooParts

ASKING FOR DISCOUNT.name: Discount Request
ASKING FOR DISCOUNT.content:
Hi,

Thank you for your interest. Our current price reflects market value and delivers the utmost value for our customers.

Best regards,
WooParts

FEEDBACK RELATED.name: Requesting Positive Feedback
FEEDBACK RELATED.content:
Hi,

We processed your refund and no return is needed. If satisfied, please leave positive feedback.

Thank you,
WooParts

FEEDBACK RELATED.name: Feedback Revision
FEEDBACK RELATED.content:
Hi,

We’ve issued a full refund; no return is needed. Please consider updating your feedback. We’ll email you with instructions.

Best regards,
WooParts

FEEDBACK RELATED.name: Revision Accepted
FEEDBACK RELATED.content:
Hi,

Thank you. Click “Accept Request” in the email to revise your feedback on eBay. Your original comments will no longer display after revision.

Best regards,
WooParts

OUT OF STOCK.name: Partial Refund
OUT OF STOCK.content:
Hi,

One of your items is out of stock; we issued a partial refund which will reflect within 1–5 business days. Use code TENOFFOOS for 10% off your next purchase.

Thank you,
WooParts

OUT OF STOCK.name: Full Refund
OUT OF STOCK.content:
Hi,

The item is out of stock; we issued a full refund which will reflect within 1–5 business days. You may keep or dispose of any system-glitched items. Use code TENOFFOOS/TENOFFOOSAPEX for 10% off a future purchase.

Sincerely,
WooParts

OEM INQUIRY.name: Response
OEM INQUIRY.content:
Hi,

Our products are aftermarket replacements with a one-year warranty covering defects. They differ from OEM parts but serve the same purpose.

Best regards,
WooParts

MULTISHIPMENT.name: Initial Email
MULTISHIPMENT.content:
Hi,

Your order will arrive in multiple shipments. We’ll notify you as soon as each tracking number becomes available.

Regards,
WooParts

MULTISHIPMENT.name: Final Email
MULTISHIPMENT.content:
Hi,

Your order has shipped in multiple packages. Track each here:

  1. [Tracking 1]
  2. [Tracking 2]

Thank you,
WooParts
